overview:
Aigars has been involved in the web as well as the marketing for the past 4 years. Developing various websites and online projects for clients and his own company. This year he managed to launch successful website and domain analytics platform called MCJOnline as well as several other online projects.

In 2011, Aigars graduated from BA School of Business in Finance in Riga with a Bachelorâ€™s Degree in Business Administration at the age of 22. He gas been recognized as a great entrepreneur and strategic thinker by his friend and co-workers.

His current venture is MCJOnline, a web service for webmasters, website owners and SEO specialists which helps to keep the track of competitors using various tools. Service was recently launched, but already over 50 000 websites have been tracked using this service and the numbers are growing exponentially.

degrees.subject: Business Administration
degrees.institution: BA School of Business and Finance in Riga
